# NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.none

**Case**

Do not authenticate with the IPSec server. Note that extended authentication may still be performed if the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec/useExtendedAuthentication] property is set. This value is only valid for IKE version 2 (IKEv2)

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Authentication methods

- **NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.certificate**: Use a certificate and private key as the authentication credential. The certificate and private key set in the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityReference] or [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityData] property will be used.
- **NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.sharedSecret**: Use a shared secret as the authentication credential. The shared secret set in the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec/sharedSecretReference] property will be used.
